HomeCourt is the free, interactive basketball app that helps anyone get better. It’s the personal basketball trainer that’s always with you, capturing your performance, your stats, and your progress—guiding you to the next level. With HomeCourt, every rep counts. 

TRAIN SMARTER
HomeCourt captures your moves and your stats as you train—so you can see your true skill level. HomeCourt uses the camera on your device to track your performance in real-time, everything from your jump shot to your crossover. In-depth data and analytics help you break down every session. HomeCourt calculates metrics like shooting percentage, accuracy, release time, dribble speed, vertical jump and more. You can even use Apple Watch to track your heart rate and save your data to HealthKit. 

ENGAGE IN FUN, INTERACTIVE DRILLS
Using HomeCourt is less like training and more like a video game. The immersive live-action experience is powered by AR (augmented reality), with virtual targets, audio cues, bonus levels, points and badges—it’s like you’re inside the game. Now practicing skills is engaging, not boring, so you’ll stick to it and improve more. 

LEARN FROM THE PROS
HomeCourt is an official partner of the NBA and provides access to the expertise of the most elite players in the game today. Train with interactive drills and instruction from NBA and WNBA athletes. Learn their moves and even compete against them in interactive challenges. 

COMPETE WITH FRIENDS
Don’t workout alone, compete virtually with your friends, family, and teammates. You can join a virtual Team on HomeCourt, or create your own Team for free. You can also challenge a friend or teammate to any HomeCourt activity with a time-shifted “Battle Mode” that matches you up head-to-head. As you compete in Battles, you collect trophies, badges, and coins, just like you would in a video game. Earn rewards and level up together.

SHOWCASE YOUR SKILLS
Engage in unique showcase activities and even get discovered directly by the NBA. Participants who opt-in to NBA Global Scout are eligible to receive invitations to select NBA tryouts, camps, tournaments, and showcases. As you build your profile on HomeCourt, you can also share your progress with individual coaches and scouts.

--
SET UP
HomeCourt is ready to use everywhere you bring your iPhone or iPad. No special basketballs, uncomfortable sensors, or expensive equipment is required. Just set up your phone with a clear view of the court and starting training and competing through HomeCourt.

PRICING

Bike Tracker is an app for everyone who loves cycling and other sport activities like running, trekking, hiking or biking.

- measure and recording the maximum biking speed and average speed
- measure and recording distance cycling tracks, 
- measure time, pace, slope and calories 
- marking your routes on the map
- light and dark color mode

- all data and statistics you can record all day and later view history

Our idea is - any bicycling activity statistics, maps, graph and others data in one app.

To use this app you don't need a mobile internet roaming data, just GPS is enough. Remember that the GPS work poorly inside the buildings and can generate inaccurate data. Sometimes outdoors GPS bike tracker may need more time to catch the good signal, especially in bad weather conditions.

This cycling app can also be used to training cross-country, enduro bike training, running, skiing, skating or any other sports practiced in the open. This app is useful for experienced professionals cyclists, but also novice bicycling users will have while using it a lot of fun.

Take your snow days to the next level! Uncover detailed stats (and bragging rights) about your days skiing and snowboarding, ride with friends, log your memories, and replay your winter adventures together. Get the best ski tracking experience on iPhone and Apple Watch!

FIND YOUR FRIENDS ON THE MOUNTAIN
Slopes supports live location sharing: see where you are and where are your friends on the mountain. With the new live recording screen, you can easily find each other! Location sharing is opt-in and privacy-focused, you can always turn it on and off. It’s only for your friends, if you ride at the same time, same resort.

LIVE RECORDING on INTERACTIVE TRAIL MAPS (Premium)

RESORT MAPS & CONDITIONS
Never get lost again with access to downloadable trail maps, right on your phone. And before you head up the mountain, check what other riders are saying about the snow quality at a resort.

SMART RECORDING
Slopes will automatically detect lifts and runs for you all day long. And with its Smart Reminders system, it can ping you if you get to a lift and hadn’t started recording yet (based on your list of resorts), or if you drive away and forgot to stop recording.

DETAILED STATISTICS
Uncover a wealth of information about your performance, know your speed, vertical, run times, distance, and more. Find out how good you are and how you’re getting even better, season-over-season.

FRIENDLY COMPETITIONS

FITNESS + APPLE WATCH

Menu Login

Menu Principal
Opción Crear Torneos
Si es un Club, un Tour de Golf o simplemente un grupo de amigos, puede crear un torneo de golf: 
	Elija un club de golf
	Ingrese un titulo para el torneo
	Y seleccione una modalidad de juego.

Una vez creado se observara un Código de Torneo en color rojo con los datos del mismo.

Recibirá un mail o un mensaje en su Celular, con un Código Alfanumérico y un Código QR para distribuir entre los jugadores participantes.

Opción Jugar Torneo
Hay 2 opciones para ingresar a Jugar:
   	Escaneando el Código QR
	O escribiendo el Código Alfanumérico, y luego ejecutando el botón JUGAR TORNEO
Ambas opciones acceden al menu Agregar Jugador, donde ingresara la matricula de su compañero de juego y seleccionara el tee de salida de cada uno.
Luego solamente deberá pulsar al botón JUGAR para ingresar al SCORECARD.

ScoreCard
Esta es su tarjeta de juego donde podrá ingresar su score y el de su marker.
Opciones de visualización:
	Score resumido de ambos jugadores
	Vista completa de la Tarjeta de juego haciendo click en el nombre de cada jugador. Ahi encontrara todos los golpes y los detalles de los hoyos (como el Par, Handicap, etc).

Leaderboard
Nunca antes jugo así al golf.
Tendrá un leaderboard completo de todos los jugadores en juego, de su categoría o de sus jugadores favoritos, viendo en tiempo real su posición dentro del torneo.

Una vez terminado el juego, deberán firmar la tarjeta ambos jugadores, desde el celular de cada uno o desde el mismo celular para validar el Score.
La información se enviara automáticamente al club donde jugo, luego sera enviada a la AAG para el computo del handicap.
